body:
## What happened

Just opened Intellij

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2022.1` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 67.1.4` • Dart plugin `221.5588`

null

comment_data.body: Please find the file named `<project-name>_android.iml`. It should either be in the top-level directory of your project, or in the `android` directory. Attach that file here so we can see if it is valid.
Thanks for the reply, it turns out that the `<project-name>_android.iml` file is an empty file in my project, after rebuilding, the error is not showing any more
OK, it sounds like a possible network glitch during project creation.

title: org.jdom.JDOMException: Unexpected End-of-input in prolog
